dict.string: OPTIONAL; Add a kollection cover photo to help other users understand what the theme of your kollection is at a glance.
OPTIONAL; Describe what this kollection is about
OPTIONAL; Think of subjects as kollection sub-headings; Example: Maybe you want your kollection to be used as a scavenger hunt; each subject could then be used as a clue

Koins are virtual currency in Kollections. How many koins are you willing to award contributors for accepted submissions? Remember, users are more likely to contribute if they receive something in return for their efforts but you can't pay out more than you have.
Is this a public or private kollection? Other users can only access your private kollection(s) using the kollection's Access ID.
Please choose a category for your kollection.
OPTIONAL; Once your kollection has been created, your friends will be alerted on Facebook.Touch the facebook icon to toggle sharing ON/OFF.
